code: import React from'react';import Page from'components/Layout/Page';import{Link,Redirect,useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{ChevronLeftIcon,Flex,Text}from'@pancakeswap/uikit';import PageLoader from'components/Loader/PageLoader';import teams from'config/constants/teams';import{useTranslation}from'contexts/Localization';import{useTeam}from'state/teams/hooks';import TeamCard from'./components/TeamCard';import TeamHeader from'./components/TeamHeader';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Team=()=>{const{id:idStr}=useParams();const id=Number(idStr);const{t}=useTranslation();const isValidTeamId=teams.findIndex(team=>team.id===id)!==-1;const team=useTeam(id);if(!isValidTeamId){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Redirect,{to:"/404"});}if(!team){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PageLoader,{});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Page,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TeamHeader,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Flex,{mb:"24px",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/teams",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Flex,{alignItems:"center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ChevronLeftIcon,{color:"primary"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{color:"primary",children:t('Teams Overview')})]})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TeamCard,{team:team})]});};export default Team;
